Several of the characters displayed symptoms of obsessive-compulsive disorder, anorexia and other potentially serious personality disorders. What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy flocked to the moon and settled. Some of these have settled into a cross between resort and club-life where they can complain about and enjoy dish-washers and waiters who are from earth, and other services. Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless action film.
